articles.content: Although Spider-Man 3 is still in the works, sources claim that Marvel is already planning out Spider-Man 4 (along with other future stand-alone movies for the character). Marvel hasnt said anything … [+3812 chars]

articles.title: Biju Menon goes emotional on director Sachy's demise - Malayalam News - IndiaGlitz.com
articles.description: One amongst director Sachy's close friends is actor Biju Menon who has worked with Sachy in several superhits.
articles.content: Mollywood filmmaker and screen-writer Sachy’s demise came as a shock to the film fraternity. The 48-year-old filmmaker passed away on Thursday following a heart attack. The director was in a critical… [+750 chars]

articles.description: Bhonsle trailer: Manoj Bajpayee plays a retired Maharashtrian police officer who refuses to support a bully. The film will release on Sony Liv on June 26.
